intro:
Write this summer into your heart.
The long-awaited game adaptation of Natsume’s Book of Friends is here!
description:
■ Spend an unforgettable summer as Takashi Natsume
The first term is over and summer vacation has finally begun.
Natsume weaves heartwarming stories through his encounters with various people.
Unravel their stories when you complete their requests.
There are five possible endings.
Enjoy an original story unique to the game—an experience you won’t find anywhere else.

■ Strengthen Bonds Through “Gifts”
Collect a variety of items by fulfilling requests or shopping in town.
Gift these to your friends and strengthen your bonds.
You might surprise them, make them smile, or receive an unexpected response—
New requests appear as your bonds strengthen!

■ Packed with Classic Summer Events
Festivals, test of courage, fireworks displays...
Enjoy a lineup of nostalgic summer events.
Each moment is sure to become a lasting memory.

■ The Beautifully Recreated World of Natsume’s Book of Friends
Warm and gently nostalgic.
Immerse yourself in the vibrant world and live out your days as “Natsume.”

■ A Journey Through Fond Memories
Those precious encounters, those heartfelt emotions...
Some requests will bring back memorable scenes from Seasons 1 through 7 of the anime.
Relive Natsume’s journey and reflect on the path he has walked.

This product supports only Japanese, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese. Thank you for your understanding.
